name: Indagar (Demo)
description:
NOTE: I recommend playing the game on a single screen and not on dual screen otherwise the game will show several bugs. I do not have two screens so do not develop the game thinking about it. Some youtubers have had problems recording the game for that reason but people who have played with a single screen have been able to play without problems. Thank you.

Julia is a young mother whose daughter has disappeared without a trace. Despite the efforts of the police and their families, Julia has no clue about her daughter. However, one night she receives a mysterious message that will put her to the limit.

-- ESPAÑOL --

Julia es una joven madre cuya hija ha desaparecido sin dejar rastro. A pesar de los esfuerzos de la policía y de sus familiares Julia no tiene ninguna pista del paradero de su hija. Sin embargo, una noche recibe un misterioso mensaje que pondrá su vida al limite.

Minimum system requirements :

SO: Windows 7

CPU: Intel i3

RAM: 4 GB

VIDEO CARD: Nvidia 710 or equivalent.

FREE SPACE: 1 GB.
